title: Supervisors vote to require all-gender restrooms in new L.A. County buildings
dc:creator: Christian Martinez
description: Los Angeles County supervisors voted to require single-occupant, all-gender bathrooms in all newly built, renovated or leased county buildings.
content:encoded: Los Angeles County supervisors voted to require single-occupant, all-gender bathrooms in all newly built, renovated or leased county buildings.

media:content.media:description: A gender neutral restroom is seen at the Downtown & Vine Restaurant and Wine Bar, Monday, May 9, 2016, in Sacramento, Calif. A measure, by Assemblyman Phil Ting, D-San Francisco, requiring all single-stall restrooms to be gender-neutral, was approved by the state Assembly, Monday. The bill now goes to the Senate. (AP Photo/Rich Pedroncelli)
